com.hdcookbook.grin.util
Class ManagedImage

java.lang.Object
  com.hdcookbook.grin.util.ManagedImage
Direct Known Subclasses:
ManagedFullImage, ManagedSubImage
public abstract class ManagedImage
extends java.lang.Object

An image that is managed by the GRIN utilities. Managed images have reference counts, and a count of how many clients have asked it to be prepared. This is used to flush images once they're no longer needed.

prepare

public abstract void prepare(java.awt.Component comp)
Prepare this image for display in the given component, or any other component for the same graphics device. This class reference counts, so there can be multiple calls to prepare.

See Also:
unprepare()

unprepare

public abstract void unprepare()
Undo a prepare. We do reference counting; when the number of active prepares hits zero, we flush the image.

See Also:
prepare(java.awt.Component)
